item.title: About
item.description:
Introduction

Hey there ðŸ‘‹

I’m Francisco, a 24-year-old Machine Learning Engineer (@ML6) based in Amsterdam. While currently based in this vibrant city, my roots trace back to the north of Portugal (Porto) - land of the good port wine, francesinha and more.

I hold a bachelor and master’s degree in Electrical and Computers Engineering from the University of Porto (where I majored in Robotics and Automation) and a second master’s in Data Science from the University of Amsterdam.

Beyond my formal education, my interests are vast and varied. Here’s a glance into what I’m passionate about:

  • the nuances of software sesign, distributed systems, and pure programming.

  • advancements in machine learning, more specifically computer vision and structured data.

  • the domain of robotics and automation.

  • navigating the intersections of tech and business strategy.

  • financial markets

  • on a more personal note, everything from productivity, self-development, and career insights to sports, and of course, reading and writing.

This Blog

The essence of this blog? It serves as a space to pen down my musings and explorations. It’s where I unpack, structure, and share reflections on all the above and more.

Whether you share these interests or are here out of sheer curiosity, I’m pleased to have you along for the ride. ðŸš€ðŸ¤—
